attributes.action: stop the closure of post offices
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: closure of these vital commodoties needs to be stopped in its tracks people that use these post offices to gain access to their benefits will have difficulty unless they have a bank account. we have to make this and other governments listen to what we the people need its like being in russia with the kgb telling us how to live we must stop this now

rejection.details:
There is a similar petition already online:
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/sub-post-offices/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
